description: Adds a RUN key that contains a powershell keyword
false_positives: Legitimate admin or third party scripts
name: Powershell in Windows Run Keys
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run* OR *\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnce*) AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*powershell* OR *FromBase64String* OR *.DownloadFile\(* OR *.DownloadString\(* OR *\ \-w\ hidden\ * OR *\-windowstyle\ hidden* OR *\ \-nop\ * OR *\ \-encodedcommand\ * OR *\-ExecutionPolicy\ Bypass*))
author: frack113
Florian Roth
